page.title: 15Fashion in North St.Ives.
page.content: THE most fashion conscious age group in St.Ives are the nine year olds to the teenagers.Most people in St.Ives are fashion conscious,but the older age groups are not so interested. The fashion at the moment is quite popular,but also very expensive. There are no fashion shops at the moment in North St.Ives,so you have to travel to town or Huntingdon to buy clothes. In town Sax,a fashion boutique and the market are the only places fashion can be bought,but for younger children fashions can be bought in Rascals. Our surveys show that fashions are mostly worn for disco's and going out. Favourite colours for clothes and shoes are white and pastels. Black and white are popular colours for shoes.
